alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 13 at 3:06AM CDT until April 14 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING TO 10 PM CDT /9 PM MDT/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains. * WHEN...From 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING TO 10 PM CDT /9 PM MDT/ FRIDAY * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Severe turbulence near the mountains will be hazardous for low flying light aircraft.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches.

area.areaDesc: Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
